transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+30 Accuracy
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.5_1:
ATK DEF HP +22%
+25 Action Points at battle start
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
Grants 1 additional random buff each turn
Increases Penetration by 30%

SKT_FIRST.name: Santa's Here!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy, and increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000093_1_1]</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Gift Shower
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) At the start of the turn, grants a <color=#28d9ed>random increased stat effect</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. (Buffs already granted to the caster will not be applied.)\n\n(Active Effect) Attacks an enemy. This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

SKT_BURST_3.effect: <color=#FFBF00>Enhanced Attack</color>\nActivates Gift of Buffs for 1 turn\nAfter gifting, grants increased Penetration for 2 turns

description: (Passive Effect) At the start of the turn, grants a <color=#28d9ed>random increased stat effect</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000093_passive_1] turn(s)</color>. (Buffs already granted to the caster will not be applied.)\n\n(Active Effect) Attacks an enemy. This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Winter Night's Blessing
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies, and uses <color=#28d9ed>Gift of Buffs</color> on all allies. <color=#28d9ed>Gifted</color> buffs last for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nThis skill's damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed, and additionally increases proportional to the number of <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> granted to all allies.
description: Attacks all enemies, and uses <color=#28d9ed>Gift of Buffs</color> on all allies. <color=#28d9ed>Gifted</color> buffs last for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000093_3_2] turn(s)</color>.\nThis skill's damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed, and additionally increases proportional to the number of <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> granted to all allies.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers Action Points of the caster and the next Skill Chain caster by <color=#28d9ed>25</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers Action Points of the caster and the next Skill Chain caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000093_chain_1_1]</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000093_backup_1_1]</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
